languages.text: {n}Лицо Инцендии дергается в ритме огня зенитного орудия.{/n} "Эта мерзавка — мой предок и мое проклятье. Аспис Чорда была жестокой, жадной, богохульной тварью. Она якшалась с {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносами{/g}, презирала веру, грабила и убивала. Ее манили темные секреты. Однажды она взошла на корабль и скрылась в глубинах {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}. Ее признали пропавшей, но я знаю — наступит кровавый день, и мы вновь увидим боевой флагман Аспис Чорда".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Инцендии дергается в ритме огня зенитного орудия.{/n} "Эта мерзавка — мой предок и мое проклятье. Аспис Чорда была жестокой, жадной, богохульной тварью. Она якшалась с ксеносами, презирала веру, грабила и убивала. Ее манили темные секреты. Однажды она взошла на корабль и скрылась в глубинах Коронуса. Ее признали пропавшей, но я знаю — наступит кровавый день, и мы вновь увидим боевой флагман Аспис Чорда".

languages.text: {n}Incendia's face twitches with the rhythm of artillery fire.{/n} "That reprobate is my forebear and my curse. Aspyce Chorda was a cruel, covetous, blaspheming monster. She fraternised with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, she despised the faith, she robbed and slaughtered. She was drawn to dark secrets. One day, she boarded her ship and vanished into the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. She was declared missing, but I know — the bloody day will come when we see Aspyce Chorda's battle flagship once more."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Инцендии дергается в ритме огня зенитного орудия.{/n} "Эта мерзавка — мой предок и мое проклятье. Аспис Чорда была жестокой, жадной, богохульной тварью. Она якшалась с {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносами{/g}, презирала веру, грабила и убивала. Ее манили темные секреты. Однажды она взошла на корабль и скрылась в глубинах {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}. Ее признали пропавшей, но я знаю — наступит кровавый день, и мы вновь увидим боевой флагман Аспис Чорда".

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia's face is twitching with the rhythm of artillery fire.{/n} "That reprobate is my ancestor and my curse. Aspyce Chorda was a cruel, covetous, blaspheming monster. She fraternized with xenos, she despised faith, she robbed and slaughtered. She was drawn to dark secrets. One day, she boarded her ship and vanished into the depths of Koronus. She was declared missing, but I know — the bloody day will come when we see Aspyce Chorda's battle flagship once more."

languages.text: {n}インセンディアの顔が砲撃のような律動で痙攣する。{/n}「あの堕落者は私の祖先にして呪いだ。アスパイス・コーダは残忍、強欲にして不敬な怪物。奴は{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}と親しく交わり、信仰を嫌悪し、盗みと殺戮を行った。闇の秘密に飲み込まれたのだ。ある日、アスパイスは自分の船に乗り込んで{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の深部へと姿を消した。奴は失踪宣告を受けたが、私には分かる―次にアスパイス・コーダの旗艦を目にすることがあれば、血の惨劇が訪れると」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twitches with the rhythm of artillery fire.{/n} "That reprobate is my forebear and my curse. Aspyce Chorda was a cruel, covetous, blaspheming monster. She fraternised with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, she despised the faith, she robbed and slaughtered. She was drawn to dark secrets. One day, she boarded her ship and vanished into the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. She was declared missing, but I know — the bloody day will come when we see Aspyce Chorda's battle flagship once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアの顔が砲撃のような律動で痙攣する。{/n}「あの堕落者は私の祖先にして呪いだ。アスパイス・コーダは残忍、強欲にして不敬な怪物。奴は{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}と親しく交わり、信仰を嫌悪し、盗みと殺戮を行った。闇の秘密に飲み込まれたのだ。ある日、アスパイスは自分の船に乗り込んで{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の深部へと姿を消した。奴は失踪宣告を受けたが、私には分かる―次にアスパイス・コーダの旗艦を目にすることがあれば、血の惨劇が訪れると」

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅如同连珠炮般吐出一段话，面容也因义愤而扭曲。{/n}“那个邪恶之人是我该受诅咒的先祖。阿斯拜丝·库尔达是头冷血无情、贪得无厌、亵渎神明的怪物。她结交{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}、蔑视信仰、烧杀抢掠，她无法抵挡深渊的诱惑。某天，她登上自己的飞船，消失在了{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}深处。虽然官方已经宣布她已经失踪，但我很清楚，总有一天，阿斯拜丝·库尔达的旗舰会再次出现。到了那个时候，必将血流成河。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twitches with the rhythm of artillery fire.{/n} "That reprobate is my forebear and my curse. Aspyce Chorda was a cruel, covetous, blaspheming monster. She fraternised with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, she despised the faith, she robbed and slaughtered. She was drawn to dark secrets. One day, she boarded her ship and vanished into the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. She was declared missing, but I know — the bloody day will come when we see Aspyce Chorda's battle flagship once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅如同连珠炮般吐出一段话，面容也因义愤而扭曲。{/n}“那个邪恶之人是我该受诅咒的先祖。阿斯拜丝·库尔达是头冷血无情、贪得无厌、亵渎神明的怪物。她结交{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}、蔑视信仰、烧杀抢掠，她无法抵挡深渊的诱惑。某天，她登上自己的飞船，消失在了{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}深处。虽然官方已经宣布她已经失踪，但我很清楚，总有一天，阿斯拜丝·库尔达的旗舰会再次出现。到了那个时候，必将血流成河。”

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Incendia se retuerce con el ritmo de la artillería.{/n} «Esa réproba es mi antepasada y mi maldición. Aspyce Chorda era un monstruo blasfemo, cruel y codicioso. Confraternizó con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, despreció la fe, robó y masacró. Se sentía atraída por los secretos siniestros. Un día, subió a su nave y desapareció en las profundidades de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Se la declaró desaparecida, pero no me engaña. Llegará un día sangriento en el que volveremos a ver la nave insignia de Aspyce Chorda en combate».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twitches with the rhythm of artillery fire.{/n} "That reprobate is my forebear and my curse. Aspyce Chorda was a cruel, covetous, blaspheming monster. She fraternised with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, she despised the faith, she robbed and slaughtered. She was drawn to dark secrets. One day, she boarded her ship and vanished into the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. She was declared missing, but I know — the bloody day will come when we see Aspyce Chorda's battle flagship once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Incendia se retuerce con el ritmo de la artillería.{/n} «Esa réproba es mi antepasada y mi maldición. Aspyce Chorda era un monstruo blasfemo, cruel y codicioso. Confraternizó con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, despreció la fe, robó y masacró. Se sentía atraída por los secretos siniestros. Un día, subió a su nave y desapareció en las profundidades de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Se la declaró desaparecida, pero no me engaña. Llegará un día sangriento en el que volveremos a ver la nave insignia de Aspyce Chorda en combate».

languages.text: {n}Les traits d'Incendia tressaillent à la cadence de tirs d'artillerie.{/n} « Cette scélérate est mon aïeule et ma malédiction. Aspyce Chorda était un monstre de cruauté, de cupidité et de blasphème. Elle fraternisait avec les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} et méprisait la foi. Elle volait et massacrait sans vergogne. Elle s'est laissée influencer par de sombres secrets. Un jour, elle et son navire se sont tout bonnement volatilisés au cœur des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Elle a été portée disparue, mais je suis certaine que son croiseur de combat ressurgira un jour. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twitches with the rhythm of artillery fire.{/n} "That reprobate is my forebear and my curse. Aspyce Chorda was a cruel, covetous, blaspheming monster. She fraternised with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, she despised the faith, she robbed and slaughtered. She was drawn to dark secrets. One day, she boarded her ship and vanished into the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. She was declared missing, but I know — the bloody day will come when we see Aspyce Chorda's battle flagship once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les traits d'Incendia tressaillent à la cadence de tirs d'artillerie.{/n} « Cette scélérate est mon aïeule et ma malédiction. Aspyce Chorda était un monstre de cruauté, de cupidité et de blasphème. Elle fraternisait avec les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} et méprisait la foi. Elle volait et massacrait sans vergogne. Elle s'est laissée influencer par de sombres secrets. Un jour, elle et son navire se sont tout bonnement volatilisés au cœur des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Elle a été portée disparue, mais je suis certaine que son croiseur de combat ressurgira un jour. »

languages.text: {n}Incendias Gesicht zuckt im Rhythmus von Artilleriefeuer.{/n} "Diese Schurkin ist meine Verwandte und mein Fluch. Aspyce Chorda war ein grausames, gieriges, blasphemisches Monster. Sie fraternisierte mit {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, verachtete den Glauben, raubte und tötete. Sie war fasziniert von dunklen Geheimnissen. Eines Tages bestieg sie ihr Schiff und verschwand in den Tiefen der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}. Sie wurde für vermisst erklärt, aber ich weiß – der verfluchte Tag wird kommen, wenn wir Aspyce Chordas Flaggkriegsschiff wiedersehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twitches with the rhythm of artillery fire.{/n} "That reprobate is my forebear and my curse. Aspyce Chorda was a cruel, covetous, blaspheming monster. She fraternised with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, she despised the faith, she robbed and slaughtered. She was drawn to dark secrets. One day, she boarded her ship and vanished into the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. She was declared missing, but I know — the bloody day will come when we see Aspyce Chorda's battle flagship once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendias Gesicht zuckt im Rhythmus von Artilleriefeuer.{/n} "Diese Schurkin ist meine Verwandte und mein Fluch. Aspyce Chorda war ein grausames, gieriges, blasphemisches Monster. Sie fraternisierte mit {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, verachtete den Glauben, raubte und tötete. Sie war fasziniert von dunklen Geheimnissen. Eines Tages bestieg sie ihr Schiff und verschwand in den Tiefen der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}. Sie wurde für vermisst erklärt, aber ich weiß – der verfluchte Tag wird kommen, wenn wir Aspyce Chordas Flaggkriegsschiff wiedersehen."

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın yüzü, top atış hızında seğiriyor.{/n} "O sefil, hem ceddim hem lanetim. Aspyce Chorda; zalim, açgözlü, günahkâr bir canavardı. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenolarla{/g} dosttu, inancı küçümser, soyar, katlederdi. Karanlık gizlere kapılmıştı. Bir gün gemisine binip {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nin{/g} derinliklerinde sırra kadem bastı. Kayıp ilan edilmiş olsa da biliyorum... Aspyce Chorda'nın sancak gemisini, ortaya çıkacağı o kanlı günde bir kez daha göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's face twitches with the rhythm of artillery fire.{/n} "That reprobate is my forebear and my curse. Aspyce Chorda was a cruel, covetous, blaspheming monster. She fraternised with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, she despised the faith, she robbed and slaughtered. She was drawn to dark secrets. One day, she boarded her ship and vanished into the depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. She was declared missing, but I know — the bloody day will come when we see Aspyce Chorda's battle flagship once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia'nın yüzü, topçu ateşi ritmiyle seğiriyor.{/n} "O sefil, hem ceddim hem lanetim. Aspyce Chorda zalim, açgözlü, günahkâr bir canavardı. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenolar{/g}la dosttu, inancı küçümser, soyar, katlederdi. Karanlık gizlere kapılmıştı. Bir gün gemisine bindi ve {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nin derinliklerinde sırra kadem bastı. Kayıp ilan edildi ama biliyorum ki Aspyce Chorda'nın amiral gemisini bir kez daha göreceğimiz o kanlı gün de gelecek."
